mapper.select: select v.id, v.name, attr_key_id, k.name attr_key_name from (select id, name, attr_key_id from attr_value where is_deleted = 0 and id in (select attr_value_id from room_attr_value where is_deleted = 0 and room_id = #{id})) v left join (select id, name from attr_key where is_deleted = 0) k on v.attr_key_id = k.id;
